-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(cc, cdif(cz, cn))))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, cv(s0)))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(co(c1, cdiv, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: The series ` G ` converges to ` log_G ( A ) + log ( A ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2017.)
